metadata.name: Mighty Mite
metadata.description: Mighty Mite gets no respect, no respect at all. Sure, he may not be too bright, but he’ll still beat the snot out of anybody that threatens Capital City. And when a new villain named “Terrible Tina” shows up, it triggers a series of events that threaten the entire planet – and maybe even the whole universe! But hapless or not, when the going gets tough, Mighty Mite gets tougher!
